divs: Sighting DetailsOur family took a drive to see the huge display's of lights on houses. We stopped at one. My kids got excited and poked there heads out the van window. I grabbed my I phone and stared to snap photo's using the passenger mirror! With all the lights and music,of course I didn't either see with the naked eye or notice a cluster of three lights in the sky behind us in the mirror. I was taking many with seconds. These were taken about a minute long. There was no other abnormal sounds. No weather conditions. No moon or stars. I download my photo's today, being so busy with the Holiday. I clean out some of my bad takes. To my surprise again, I looked at the photo's to see something that didn't belong there. Behind us there it was bright as day. Perfect 3 cluster lights. I read on these before. I'm sure the lights attracted the UFO. I have 4 photo's of the UFO and one before where it is not there.Please scrach my kids faces before publishing. Thank you.
Summary: My family and I drove over to see a house full of lights. I thought it was so cute my kids sticking there heads out to see. I took photos useing my iphone. I took them in the mirror. I download my photo's and seen a cluster of 3 white lights together
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Saco
There were no other sightings in Saco on or around December 11th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
